LabelText: Record indications of password spraying (many users, few common passwords, lockout patterns)
Identify authentication endpoints targeted (cloud identity, VPN, email, SSO)
Block malicious IPs or implement geo/IP reputation-based restrictions
Check for any successful logins from attacker infrastructure
Force password changes for accounts successfully accessed or repeatedly targeted
Verify password policy enforces strong, non-common passwords
Ensure MFA is enabled and enforced for privileged and high-risk accounts
Document timelines, accounts impacted, and improvements to controls
